column1: # Name: Persons of concern, (includes refugees, asylum seekers, returned refugees, IDPs, returned IDPs, stateless persons)

# Definition: Persons of Concern is a term used to describe all people whose protection and assistance needs are of interest to UNHCR, including: refugees, asylum seekers, returned refugees, internally displaced people (IDP), returned IDPs, and stateless persons.
# Source: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
